name: SpaceW
description:
Welcome to SpaceW - a fun and easy to learn varian of Japanese shogi! The game is inspired by Dōbutsu shōgi (Animal shogi, Let's catch the lion), a small shogi variant invented by a female professional shogi player, Madoka Kitao.

You can play this game with another friend, or against the computer. There are two difficulties currently. Hope you can beat them both!

For any suggestion for improvements, please write a comment. I am looking toward to your feedback!

Now, it is your turn to take control of different units and win the ultimate victory for your planet!
